#Abstract

This report seeks to replicate the research found in *Simple Linear Regression*, chapter 3 of the book **An Introduction to Statistical Learning** by Gareth James, et al., on a set of advertising data.

#Introduction

The goal of this research is to use existing data to formulate a marketing plan that will result in higher product sales. To that end,

This project also serves as an introduction to linear regression and as an exercise in using R commands from the command line.
